DOC.brief_title: Adverse Drug Reactions of Different Brands of Ceftazidime Injection
DOC.detailed_description: Ceftazidime is a third generation cephalosporins that should be reserved for severe bacterial infections. Substitution of the brand ceftazidime with a generic ceftazidime raised some concerns. The purpose of this study is to understand whether generic ceftazidime causes different adverse drug reaction incidence from the brand drug.
DOC.mesh_term: Drug-Related Side Effects and Adverse Reactions
DOC.criteria: patients in surgical intensive care unit who require ceftazidime treatment less than 1 year old
